extendedInfo.description: Simply Rain application allows you to listen and relax to the peaceful sound of rain to help relax the busy mind. // Add us on Google+ //// gplus.to/ConsciousDev //Use Simply Rain when you take a nap, or simply just lay and relax to the sound* HEADPHONES RECOMMENDED**BEST IF YOU USE WHILE YOU SLEEP*Uses-Select from the sound type buttons (soft rain, hard rain, forest rain and  great rain sounds on full App).click once to startclick again to stop*In app Sounds-Soft Rain-Hard Rain-Forest Rain-Piano Rain-Rain Dream-Meditation Rain*permissions_connects to the internet to generate the Ad'sKeywords: relax - rain - sound - rain sound - sleep - simply - Rain - Sound

reviews.comment: Needs SD card support - this app is huge! Also the buttons in the app barely work and it doesn\'t have the ability to run the sounds in the background
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Unreal
reviews.comment: The sounds are unrealistic uninstalled it.
reviews.author: A Google User
